thread.title: 8 people suffer injuries in New Orleans East fire
thread.title_full: 8 people suffer injuries in New Orleans East fire - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: 8 people suffer injuries in New Orleans East fire
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - A fire overnight in New Orleans East engulfed an apartment in flames with several people trapped inside.
It happened around 3:20 a.m. on Thursday at an apartment complex in the 4400 block of Gawain Drive.
Seven of the victims were able to escape through a rear window before firefighter arrived. A neighbor was forced to escape from the flames, as well.
The victims suffered varying degrees of smoke inhalation, except an 8-year-old boy, who cut his leg while escaping through a window.
Authorities believe the fire sparked from a lit candle .
Firefighters were able to contain the damage to five other units in the 52 unit apartment complex.
The American Red Cross is providing assistance to the victims.
Copyright 2015 WVUE .
